statements: SELECT * FROM SupplierInformation;
SELECT SupplierName, ContactPerson FROM SupplierInformation WHERE SupplierID = 1;
SELECT SupplierName, Address FROM SupplierInformation WHERE SupplierID IN (2, 4, 6);
SELECT * FROM SupplierInformation ORDER BY SupplierID DESC;
SELECT SupplierID, SupplierName FROM SupplierInformation WHERE Address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT SupplierName, ContactPerson, ContactNumber FROM SupplierInformation WHERE SupplierID = 1;
SELECT * FROM SupplierInformation WHERE SupplierID > 5 ORDER BY SupplierName DESC;
SELECT SupplierName, Address FROM SupplierInformation WHERE ContactNumber LIKE '%123%';
SELECT SupplierName, ContactPerson FROM SupplierInformation WHERE SupplierName LIKE 'A%' AND ContactPerson IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM SupplierInformation WHERE Address IS NOT NULL ORDER BY SupplierID ASC, SupplierName DESC;
SELECT * FROM supplier_information;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person FROM supplier_information ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_email FROM supplier_information WHERE supplier_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM food_safety_standards WHERE compliance_level = 'High';
SELECT standard_name, required_certifications FROM food_safety_standards ORDER BY standard_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM supplier_information WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person FROM supplier_information WHERE supplier_id < 5 ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM food_safety_standards WHERE compliance_level = 'High' ORDER BY standard_name ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_email FROM supplier_information WHERE supplier_id IN (2, 4) AND contact_person IS NOT NULL;
SELECT count(*) AS total_suppliers FROM supplier_information;
SELECT * FROM Supplier;
SELECT supplier_name, email FROM Supplier WHERE supplier_id = '1234-5678';
SELECT product_name, category FROM Product ORDER BY category DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, phone_number FROM Supplier WHERE supplier_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT inspector, passed FROM Inspection WHERE inspection_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Supplier WHERE supplier_name = 'ABC Suppliers';
SELECT product_name, category FROM Product WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, email, phone_number FROM Supplier WHERE supplier_name LIKE '%Company%' AND email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person FROM Supplier ORDER BY supplier_name DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT product_name, production_date, expiration_date FROM Product WHERE production_date >= '2022-01-01' AND expiration_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE certification_status = TRUE
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC
SELECT * FROM products WHERE production_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT product_name, expiration_date FROM products WHERE supplier_id = 3
SELECT inspection_id, inspector_name, result FROM inspections
SELECT supplier_name, location FROM suppliers
SELECT product_name, expiration_date FROM products
SELECT inspector_name, result FROM inspections
SELECT violation_description FROM violations
SELECT * FROM suppliers
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, address, phone_number FROM suppliers;
SELECT product_name, category, expiration_date FROM products WHERE expiration_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT check_id, check_date, pass FROM quality_checks WHERE pass = true;
SELECT inspector_name, inspection_date, comments FROM inspections ORDER BY inspection_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT supplier_name, address, phone_number FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 2;
SELECT product_name, category, expiration_date FROM products WHERE product_id = 3;
SELECT inspector_name, inspection_date, comments FROM inspections WHERE inspection_id = 4;
SELECT violation_description, fine_amount FROM violations WHERE violation_id = 5;
